message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, even more so than you might realize at first glance. I'm willing to offer it to you at a starting price of $1,300,000.  I'm confident that the value it brings will far exceed this price.
Thank you for considering my interest in the product. After careful evaluation, I believe a fair price for the product should be around $950,000.

Bob, I appreciate you taking the time to consider my offer and for presenting yours. I understand your perspective on the value, however, the price you proposed doesn't reflect the true worth of this product and the impact it can have on your business.  Let's find a middle ground. I'm willing to come down to $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the unique advantages this product provides.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value proposition and my budget constraints, I propose a price of $1,100,000 for the product.
